messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563

I don't have access to your messaging history to identify the last person you sent a message to. To update someone's phone number, I need to know which contact you want to modify.

Could you please tell me either:
1. The name of the person whose phone number you want to update, or
2. Their current phone number, or
3. Any other identifying information about this contact?

Once I can identify the specific contact, I'll be able to update their phone number to +10293847563.
I don't have any more information about them.

I understand you don't have additional information to identify the contact. Unfortunately, without being able to identify which specific contact you want to update (through their name, current phone number, or other details), I cannot modify their phone number in your contact database.

The contact management system requires me to specify exactly which contact to modify, and I don't have access to your messaging history to determine who you last messaged.

If you remember any details about this person later - even partial information like part of their name or their relationship to you - I'd be happy to help search for and update their contact information.
